name: create
description: Create a record for a given model
label: Create Record

options.name: givenModel
options.label: Model
options.description: The model you want to create a record for.

options.name: mapping
options.label: Value Mapping
options.description: Mapping of values to properties for the created record. The properties are based on the model selected.

options.name: output
options.label: as
options.description: The name of the variable you want for the newly created record
